item.title: Cloud run+Firebase development [Web application development]
item.description: # Overview I am actively using GCP, but I thought that Cloud run + Firebase would be good if I wanted to make a service cheaply and easily, so I summarized it. As for maintainability, I think Cloud run is better when comparing Cloud run and Cloud Functions. Development environment list Source Repository Cloud build Cloud run Firebase(hosting) #Introduction First, enable the service in the above environment. The minimum required IAM for gcloud is as follows.

item.title: 3 months after graduating from programming school
item.description: In October 2019, I attended a certain programming school where I often see advertisements on youtube, and since November I have been in my current position as a machine learning engineer and data scientist. Three months after graduating, I would like to write about what I learned from the school, what was useful, and what is difficult now. Biography April 2015 Served as a research and development position for a food company for 4 years July 2019 Start of programming school learning October 2019, graduated from programming school November 2019 Job change as a machine learning engineer and data scientist

item.title: I tried a visual regression test on GitHub Pages
item.description: #Motivation Hello @glassmonkey. CI is Github Action. Since I wanted to try using images if I did CI, I tried a visual regression test easily. I made it in a rush, so I would appreciate any feedback. #What is a visual regression test? The explanation on Astamuse-sama’s blog was easy to understand, so I will quote it. The visual regression test is a visual regression test, specifically a test that takes a screenshot and extracts the differences.

item.title: [Qiita API] Get Views, Likes, Stocks in various ways (JavaScript, Google Script, Python, Vue.js)
item.description: ## Introduction Looking at my post on Qiita, I see three numbers: “Page view”, “Like” and “Stock”. I like the “likes” of all posts on my page, but I don’t know the View and Stock of each post or the total. Since I have about 20 posts, I decided to try various methods to get all of my posts, views, likes, and stocks for studying. When I looked it up, everyone hit the Qiita API in various ways to obtain information, and there are many reference pages, so I will carry out it while checking them.
